title: Chaitanya Bishnoi, Aaron Jones, Sunny Patel set for Major League Cricket 2024
body:
Chaitanya Bishnoi, Aaron Jones, Sunny Patel set for Major League Cricket 2024

The Domestic Supplementary Draft for Major League Cricket (MLC) took place on June 18, finalizing the rosters for the upcoming second season, set to commence on July 5. Among the domestic players selected was Aaron Jones, the vice-captain of Team USA.

Aaron Jones (PTI Photo)

NEW DELHI: The Domestic Supplementary Draft for Major League Cricket ( MLC ) took place on June 18, finalizing the rosters for the upcoming second season, set to commence on July 5. Among the domestic players selected was Aaron Jones , the vice-captain of Team USA.

With the immense popularity of the T20 World Cup and the success of the American team, three MLC teams--Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, and Seattle Orcas--had an available roster spot, allowing undrafted domestic players the chance to secure a place in the forthcoming tournament.

The supplementary draft order was randomly determined on June 18, and the teams were allotted a 48-hour window to strategize and conclude any internal discussions before proceeding with their picks.

The domestic supplementary draft selections were as follows:

LA Knight Riders - Chaitanya Bishnoi

A top-order batsman and spin bowler, the 29-year-old played for the Chennai Super Kings championship side in 2018 before moving to the United States to pursue his cricket in early 2023. He was a part of the San Francisco Unicorns squad in the 2023 inaugural season of Major League Cricket, featuring in all five matches for the Bay Area side.

He was also a key member of the Dallas Xforia Giants during the 2023 edition of Minor League Cricket.

Seattle Orcas - Aaron Jones

Jones finds himself back in a recognizable locker room, as he was part of the Orcas squad during the first season of Major League Cricket last year. The opening batsman has been instrumental in Team USA's impressive run in the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup. Throughout Team USA's unprecedented World Cup journey, Jones has been making waves and was a key player in the USA's remarkable victory against Pakistan in Texas. The Orcas faithful will be eagerly anticipating more of the same from Jones during the MLC season.

MI New York - Sunny Patel

Sunny Patel, a versatile cricketer who bats right-handed in the middle order and bowls leg spin, made a significant impact during the 2023 Minor League Cricket season. His all-round skills were instrumental in propelling the New Jersey Somerset Cavaliers to the Championship match, although they ultimately suffered a defeat against the Dallas Mustangs. As MI New York prepares for the 2024 season, Patel brings a unique dimension to their domestic player contingent. He stands out as the sole domestic leg-spinner on their roster, offering a valuable asset to the team's bowling arsenal.

"Major League Cricket plays a critical role in developing domestic players and providing a pathway to play cricket at the highest level amongst some of the best players in the world. We are thrilled to welcome Chaitanya, Aaron, and Sunny to the 2024 MLC season, adding three more talented domestic players to our league," said Major League Cricket Tournament Director, Justin Geale as per a MLC release.

The highly anticipated second season of MLC is set to kick off on July 5, featuring a thrilling opening match between the defending champions MI New York and the Seattle Orcas at Morrisville, NC. Following this clash, the Texas Super Kings will face off against the LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX.

Given the overwhelming success and packed stadiums of the inaugural season, cricket enthusiasts are advised to secure their tickets well in advance to avoid disappointment. Fans can choose from various ticket options, with general admission tickets starting at an affordable price of $30 per person, ensuring accessibility for all.

End of Article

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA

title: Lexus becomes Automotive Partner of Cognizant Major League Cricket
body:
Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is thrilled to announce that luxury automotive brand Lexus has become the Automotive Partner for the league's highly anticipated second season.

Vijay Srinivasan, CEO, Cognizant Major League Cricket said, "We are excited to welcome Lexus as the Automotive Partner of Major League Cricket. Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation."

Under the new agreement, Lexus will be integrated into on-field and broadcast content throughout the season. The brand will also be featured in fan communications and MLC digital platforms. This is the first time Lexus and MLC have partnered together.

David Telfer, Head of Lexus Advertising & Media said, “Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans. We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans.”

MLC kicks off its second season on Friday, July 5. The season's excitement extends beyond the pitch, with entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.

title: Lexus To Elevate Fan Experience As New Automotive Partner Of Major League Cricket
body:
-Irwin Mills

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) has announced that Lexus will be the Automotive Partner for its second season. "We are excited to welcome Lexus as the Automotive Partner of Major League Cricket," said Vijay Srinivasan, CEO of MLC. "Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation."

Under this new partnership, Lexus will be prominently featured in on-field and broadcast content throughout the season. The brand will also appear in fan communications and on MLC’s digital platforms. This collaboration marks the first time that Lexus and MLC have joined forces.

"Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans," said David Telfer, National Manager of Lexus Advertising and Media. "We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans."

Lexus is known for its dedication to innovative design, advanced technology, and thrilling performance, which allows it to create remarkable experiences for its customers. Since its inception in 1989 with two luxury sedans, Lexus has expanded its lineup to cater to luxury customers in over 90 countries.

In the United States, Lexus vehicles are sold through 244 dealers offering a full range of luxury vehicles. The brand leads in luxury hybrids with eight models featuring Lexus Hybrid Drive. Additionally, Lexus offers nine F SPORT models, one F performance model, and one F model.

The second season of MLC begins on Friday, July 5. Tickets for all matches, including four playoffs, are available online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website. General admission tickets start at $30 per person.

Fans can expect more than just world-class cricket matches; there will be entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.

About Cognizant Major League Cricket

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) is the first professional Twenty20 cricket championship in the United States. Exclusively sanctioned by USA Cricket, MLC showcases superstar players from around the globe, bringing world-class T20 cricket to America.

MLC’s transformative first season occurred in the summer of 2023 and featured six teams: Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and Washington Freedom.

This partnership between MLC and Lexus aims to enhance fan engagement while promoting both brands' values of excellence and commitment to their audiences.

title: Lexus To Elevate Fan Experience As New Partner Of Cognizant Major League Cricket
body:
-Zackary Robert Berlin

Cognizant Major League Cricket (MLC) has announced a partnership with luxury car brand Lexus for its second season. The collaboration will see Lexus integrated into on-field and broadcast content throughout the season, as well as featuring in fan communications and MLC digital platforms.

This marks the first time the two brands have joined forces. Vijay Srinivasan, CEO of MLC, expressed his excitement about the partnership, that Lexus's commitment to luxury and customer satisfaction aligns with MLC's vision.

Lexus and MLC: A New Partnership

David Telfer, Head of Lexus Advertising & Media, said that partnering with MLC offers the opportunity to reach a diverse fanbase while sharing a commitment to performance, customer experience, and fans.

He added that Lexus is committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the US team and engage new fans. The second season of MLC begins on Friday, July 5th.

Ticket Information and Season Highlights

Tickets for all matches, including playoffs, can be purchased online through the Official Cognizant Major League Cricket website. General admission tickets start at $30 per person.

The season promises excitement beyond the pitch, featuring entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, player signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament. Fans are encouraged to secure their tickets quickly at tickets.majorleaguecricket.com.

About Cognizant Major League Cricket

Cognizant Major League Cricket is the first professional Twenty20 cricket championship in the United States. Sanctioned by USA Cricket, MLC showcases superstar players from around the world and brings world-class T20 cricket to America.

The league's inaugural season took place in 2023 and featured six teams: Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, San Francisco Unicorns, Seattle Orcas, Texas Super Kings, and Washington Freedom.

In conclusion, this partnership between Cognizant Major League Cricket and Lexus promises an exciting second season for fans while showcasing both brands' commitment to excellence in their respective fields.

Following the mammoth interest in the T20 World Cup and America’s success, three MLC teams—Los Angeles Knight Riders, MI New York, and Seattle Orcas had a roster place available, providing the opportunity for undrafted domestic players to secure a place on a team roster in the upcoming tournament.

The draft order was randomly determined on June 18, and teams were given 48 hours to strategize and finalize any internal discussions before the supplementary draft occurred.

title: Major League Cricket names Lexus as automotive partner ahead of second season
body:
Major League Cricket (MLC), the United States’ professional T20 league, has announced a sponsorship agreement with one of the leading automotive brands, Lexus.

As part of the deal, the brand has become the automotive partner for the league’s highly anticipated second season.

Vijay Srinivasan, CEO of MLC, said, “We are excited to welcome Lexus as the Automotive Partner of Major League Cricket. Their reputation for unparalleled luxury and commitment to their customers aligns perfectly with our vision for the league. Together, we look forward to delivering an exceptional experience to cricket fans across the nation.”

The new deal calls for Lexus to be included in broadcast and on-field content all season long. The brand will also be promoted through fan communications and MLC digital media.

David Telfer, Head of Lexus Advertising & Media, said, “Partnering with Major League Cricket offers Lexus the opportunity to reach a new diverse fanbase with a brand that shares an unwavering commitment to performance, customer experience, and their fans. We’re committed to growing with MLC during its second season to elevate the presence of the U.S. team and engage with new fans.”

Earlier this month, MLC also collaborated with Remitly, a leading digital money transfer service. Additionally, brands such as Cognizant, Royal, and Stake have also partnered with the league for the season ahead.

The second season of MLC is set to begin on July 5. Tickets for all games, which include the four playoffs, can be purchased online via the Major League Cricket website. In addition to world-class competitions, fans enjoy a variety of ticket options, with general admission tickets commencing at $30 per person.

The season’s enthusiasm goes beyond the field, with entertainment, fireworks, free giveaways, athlete signings and meet-and-greets, merchandise giveaways, food trucks, and samples throughout the tournament.

title: Player Profile
body:
Ayan Desai, born July 13, 2003, a promising U-23 Left arm pacer for the Seattle Orcas, wields a left-hand bat and left-arm fast bowling. With an economy of under 8 in Minor League Cricket, he's a potential game-changer. Expect Desai to shine in Major League Cricket, showcasing his dual skills and youthful vigor.

title: Glenn Maxwell Joins Washington Freedom for Major League Cricket Season
body:
Glenn Maxwell, the newest Australian player to join the Washington Freedom, has confirmed his decision to join the Major League Cricket (MLC) team.

Maxwell's decision to not play for Royal Challengers Bengaluru in the IPL was primarily due to his poor performance, not a need for a mental break.

He will join fellow Australian teammates Head and Smith, and former IPL coach Ricky Ponting at the Washington Freedom.

Other confirmed signings for the second season of MLC include Head, Smith, Adam Zampa, Spencer Johnson, Tim David, Matt Short, and Jake Fraser-McGurk.

Maxwell clarified his decision to request exclusion from RCB's lineup in the recent IPL match against Sunrisers Hyderabad, stating he had a sense of exclusion from the top eleven players.

Royal Challengers Bengaluru all-rounder Glenn Maxwell has decided to take an indefinite “mental and physical” break from the Indian Premier League, blaming his wretched batting form for the decision.

The World Cup-winning Australia all-rounder Glenn Maxwell planned to play in the Indian Premier League until the end of his career, calling it one of his greatest learning experiences.
